blog.name: incorrectstuckyquotes
blog.title: totally canon stucky
blog.description: i'm also @canonavengers on twitter!!!

summary: tony: i can't believe you're trying to fit three people on one motorcycle. steve: wait, what do you mean three? tony: you, nat...
body:
tony: i can’t believe you’re trying to fit three people on one motorcycle.


steve: wait, what do you mean three?


tony: you, nat and sam ??


nat: but where’s…?


tony: who?


sam: oh yeah, that’s what i meant to tell you!! bucky fell off about an hour ago.

summary: Mama wants grandbabies, stat. - shetlandowl - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Mama wants grandbabies, stat. - shetlandowl - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
Characters: Sarah Rogers, Peter Parker, Mary Jane Watson, Original Characters
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Teachers, Alternate Universe - Elementary School, How Do I Tag, Steve is a teacher and Tony works in a museum, Fluff and Humor, This is as much a Sarah Rogers & Friends Conspire to Get Steve A Date as it is Meet-Cute, Meet-Cute
Series: Part 1 of Stony Bingo Card 2017, Part 1 of Mother knows best
Summary:

It might not take a village, but that doesn’t mean children don’t need help to get where they need to be. When Steve can’t seem to manage on his own, what good mother would stand aside and let any opportunity pass him by?

Sarah Rogers is not that kind of mother.

summary: Ok I firmly believe that Carol and Tony would get along fantastically. Their pasts are so similar. Both were lied to by their...
body:
Ok I firmly believe that Carol and Tony would get along fantastically. Their pasts are so similar. Both were lied to by their mentors and were taught to believe that what they were doing was for the greater good. It isn’t until they see the other side, what they’re actually doing do they realize what is going on. That they’ve both been in a way brainwashed and yet despite this are able to defeat their mentor figures and become the superheroes both were destined to be.

I stan both so much

I am a curator of Fanfiction. I reblog NSFW and SFW stories. Mood boards can be found @theenchantedgalleryofstories. I used to be yourtropegirl.
Weekly Recommendations/
Sideblogs/OTP Masterlist/Writer Masterlist/Writer Requests/
Writing Prompts/Tag List/Tumblr Peeps on AO3

title: Trope Blogs
body:
I have finished moving all the stories from my weekly reading list to the their respective blogs. Somethings may appear twice. Mostly cause I don’t remember if I reblogged them or not

I will add to the blogs as I read. My reading has dropped significantly the last couple months. But I will keep up as best as I can. 

You can check out the blogs here: 

A/B/O Dynamics: @fanficfaeriesabolibrary

Modern AU: @fanficfaeriesmodernaulibrary

Soulmate AU: @fanficfaeriessoulmatelibrary

Historical AU: @fanficfaerieshistoricalaulibrary

summary:
Ned: Am I the only person in this room who isn't dating someone?
Tony, stealing a kiss from Stephen: No. Peter's single.
Percy:...
body:
Ned: Am I the only person in this room who isn’t dating someone?

Tony, stealing a kiss from Stephen: No. Peter’s single.

Percy: *bursts in and kisses Peter just to prove Tony wrong*

Peter: *smiles into it*

Tony and Stephen: …

Ned: Apparently so

blog.name: marvelsocialmedia
blog.title: Marvel Media
blog.description: A blog dedicated to giving our heroes the happy life they deserve

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Making New Dreams
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HXaHkt

by howling_roosters

Set right after the Avengers: Infinity War Part 1.

Tony Stark is blessed by Hope. But he’s always been better acquainted with misery. So he uses the blessing the way he knows how to (and maybe helps more than a few people along the way).

Or, Tony Stark is a beacon of light that makes everything brighte.

Words: 1092, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Thor, Brunnhilde | Valkyrie (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Jarvis (Iron Man movies), Friday (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts, Nebula (Marvel), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton
  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Avengers Family, Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie) Spoilers, Slow Build, Original Character(s)


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HXaHkt

by howling_roosters

Set right after the Avengers: Infinity War Part 1.

Tony Stark is blessed by Hope. But he’s always been better acquainted with misery. So he uses the blessing the way he knows how to (and maybe helps more than a few people along the way).

Or, Tony Stark is a beacon of light that makes everything brighte.

by Thunderbirdswolvesandlilacs

The MCU is horrible about portraying realistic consequences for things that happen. What if characters were called out on their poor decisions and had to face the consequences of their actions?

blog.name: thelastdragon6
blog.title: Starkwalker
blog.description:
HERE TO HAVE A GOOD TIME

<a href=“https://thelastdragon6.tumblr.com/post/183831557809/master-list”>Masterlist.</a>

summary: Things had changed in many ways first Wanda had left with vision and I couldn’t be prouder. She’s become to be like my sister...
body:
Lost way ch.10

Things had changed in many ways first Wanda had left with vision and I couldn’t be prouder. She’s become to be like my sister after all the things she’s been through she deserves to be happy. Second Steve had grown his hair and beard. Which I’m totally digging by the way and Natasha has died her hair she said it’s better so she wouldn’t be recognized. Sam and I didn’t really change our appearance we’ve remained the same throughout our time hiding. And third we now fight and try to find people who have hidden alien technology.

“ okay I’ve got it! There seems to be 10 in there. And it doesn’t seem like they have a lot of weapons just a couple guns.” I say to the others through my earpiece. While keeping an eye on the people Inside their hideout.

“ you’re not sure?” Sam asked. I roll my eyes at his response.

“ I don’t got X-ray vision and you don’t got red wing so NO! I’m not sure.” I tell him.

“ okay guys focus this should be easy we just get done with this and we take a break for a while.” Steve says.

“ well deserved break.” I respond with a sigh.

“ okay you guys ready?” Natasaha asks.

“ yes.”

She then throws a smoke screen through the windows and we then enter. All the people in here are coughing and distracted and confused so we get them cuffed. I feel one grab my neck from behind.

“ wrong choice buddy.” I say and kick their crotch area. I hear them groan and let me go. I grab their arm and twist behind their back and cuff them. The shooting then starts so I duck behind a wall.

“ got this.” I hear Sam say through the earpiece. The shooting stops seconds later so I get out. From the corner of my eye I see someone hiding behind the door. So I duplicate myself. My other self opens the door revealing a women. She grabs her gun and shakily points it at my clone. She pulls the trigger and shoots. One she see that it goes through she begins shooting multiple times. I roll my eyes and walk towards her.

“ if you didn’t see it work the first time why try again?” I ask the women as my clone disappears. The women tries shooting me but she ran out of bullets. She swings at me but duck and punch her in the jaw. She steps back as she grabs her jaw. She bumps into Natasha and tries to run the other way but I quickly get her and cuff her. After that we leave them their and gather all the alien technology. We go hide and wait until the police come to get them.

“ that was easy.” I say as we make our for the jet.

“ yea well they didn’t know what they were doing. They just robbed this thinking it was going to be easy.” Steve says.

We got on the jet and head our to another place. As we’re still in the air Steve gets a call. It was Bruce. Apparently there was aliens on earth looking for some stones. And that they were heading to go get visions stone.

“ I was looking forward to that break.” Sam says a little annoyed at the whole situation.

-

We get to where Wanda and vision are supposed to be. At first I thought it was going to be hard to spot them but I saw big ass ship floating in the sky. And not seconds later I see someone crash into crash into the subway station. We all go different ways and discreetly get inside.

I see them stop and look towards Steve. Once they’re distracted with Steve Sam flys in and kicks one out of the way. Natasha Stabs the other one and while she’s struggling I run out and send him flying across the other way. The other alien tries to hit me with her spear but I slide out of the way and kick her in the chest and get up. She falls to the floor but immediatly gets up. Steve then attacks her. I get out my swords and try to stab her side but she’s quick and uses her spear to block it. She swings at me but I get her spear caught between my swords. While I flip the other side I kick her in the face making her drop her spear and fall backwards. She jumps up and goes for her spear. Natasha , Steve and I surround her and she tries fighting us but Sam then flys in and kick us her. Before she tries anything else Sam points his pistols at her.

“ we don’t want to kill you but we will.” Natasha tells her as we get all go stand in front of them.

“ you won’t have the chance again.” The alien girl says before floating up.

We all go to where Vision and Wanda are and help them go to the jet. When we were on the jet I could tell something was wrong with Steve. I put my hand on his shoulder in comfort.

“ where to Cap?” Sam asked from the front seat. He turned to look at me and seemed to relax just a bit at as I comforted him. He put his hand on top of mine and caressed the top of my hand.

“ home.” He said.

.

.

.

.

.
